Dev Portal

Github

Click the cards below to see the projects

Zsh/Bash Me

Create and publish a one page html document giving a brief introduction of who I am, and my interests in web technologies. Built using only the terminal.

Commitment

HTML page with an overview of basic css. Goal was to do 100 github commits in order to get used to useing git commands.

Exquisite Corpse

A collaborative narrative website about a spaceship traveling to settle a planet. However, crew members start waking up beofre they are supposed to and end up missing. The goal of the project was to learn how to use git collaboratively and deal with merge conflicts.

Parallax Narrative

Story narrative website using parallax, html boilerplate, and webpack. My story is about the start of a race, and uses parallax to move the race cars at different speeds.

Creative Project

Learned about and created a short animation demo using the node library animeJs. My project also link to the github where the readMe document give a short tutorial of setting up and using animeJs.

Analytics Report

I used google analytics on my parallax project, and this is the summary of the users I got after sending to friends and family.
